title: Amadeus : distribution market share 2010 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Market share. In total the number of data points it has is 10.
In general Market share has rose over the Year.
Market share is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2016, and finally roughly constant from 2016 to 2019.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Market share, about 44.0 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Market share, of value 36.7 was reported at Year 2010
